column5: Awesome report. That is a beautiful drift boat. Landry
wow that boat looks amazing, I can see how the adrenaline gets pumping fishing like that !!!
Wow !!!  That drift boat is amazing should be in a magazine for sure !!! That vid is cool too gets your heart pumping ..... Thanks for sharing
yup, sweet boat. I was glued to the screen looking for that strike!
How bout a half ounce lead jig hung up 20 yards out that suddenly dislodges, flies out of the water like a bullet and hits you square between the eyes. That brought me to my knees. Right quick!
I think these flies weigh a little more than a half ounce jig....been nailed in the front and back of the head plenty of times hucking them around.
God i'm old. I remember when Ken was first getting into flyfishing.
